title: UP schools to remain closed for classes 1 to 8 till April 11 amid surge in COVID-19 cases

title: Coronavirus Updates | Uttar Pradesh reports 2,967 new cases, 16 deaths
description: Coronavirus Updates: India on Friday recorded 81,466 fresh Covid-19 cases in the biggest spike in six months. Actor Alia Bhatt became the latest celebrity to test positive coronavirus. Alia Bhatt, who is shooting a film with director Sanjay Leela Bhansali had earlier tested negative for Covid-19 when Bhansali and her boyfriend Ranbir Kapoor contracted the disease. On Thursday, India launched a vaccination drive for those above 45 years. Centre has asked the state governments to make necessary arrangements for the vaccination drive. Meanwhile, as Mumbai reported a sharp increase of over 8,600 cases, the city mayor hinted at bringing some restrictions from April 2.
